VIEW THE COLLECTION →
New world tells the story of a young man named Shinji Yamazaki, who got into the wrong place at the wrong time. But after one incident, his whole life changed... And you must find out what happened to him! Find and collect the entire collection to find out how the story ends. Legendary stories come to life again in NFT format!

The first book on the
New world is an NFT collection based on the history of Shinji Yamazaki, in order to understand and understand what happened to Shinji, you have to collect a complete set of collection from all cards!

Series1 is currently available, but with subsequent updates to our collection, new parts of our story will be released under series1,2,3 ...
Why Collect New world?
The better question is, why not collect New world? New world is a fun new NFT that Released on AtomicHub. This is the first collection through which you will be able to read through our art , our book. Each card is very important! The first book on the AtomicHub site. Everyone from a barista to a major player in the market will be able to collect our cards! Absolutely everyone will be able to become an assistant in the developing NFTs technology!
Creating NFT art

Creating a sketch and drawing it to the program
